scripts.jupyter-server: jupyter server --ServerApp.tornado_settings='{"headers":{"Access-Control-Allow-Origin": "*", "Content-Security-Policy": "frame-ancestors self http://localhost:${npm_config_port}/"}}' --ServerApp.token='' --ServerApp.password='' --ServerApp.allow_origin='*' --ServerApp.disable_check_xsrf="True" --no-browser --ServerApp.port=${npm_config_portjupyter} 2> jupyter-server-err.log > jupyter-server.log
scripts.docker-jupyter-server: jupyter server --allow-root --ServerApp.ip='0.0.0.0' --ServerApp.tornado_settings='{"headers":{"Access-Control-Allow-Origin": "*", "Content-Security-Policy": "frame-ancestors self http://0.0.0.0:${npm_config_port}/"}}' --ServerApp.token='' --ServerApp.password='' --ServerApp.allow_origin='*' --ServerApp.disable_check_xsrf="True" --no-browser --ServerApp.port=${npm_config_portjupyter} 2> jupyter-server-err.log > jupyter-server.log
